Reviews.Title: It is a great Android tablet
Reviews.Author: Christopher WANG
Reviews.Content: It is a great Android tablet, it has Google Voice Search. You do not have to type, just ask and it is able to recognize and dictate the answer. That's really cool. I could use it take pictures for my children, as you know, it has 7'' screen, much bigger than a camera, and easier to notice the details of their facial expression. And you also can use it for Video Call, as the Wi-Fi function of it works very well. And it is at great price, having a tablet like this with Wi-Fi is a big bonus. Imagine having Wikipedia at your fingertips for your child. I tried a few educational applications on this. I consider this as a big hit with educators and gamers. One downside is the short battery life and slow charging time. Christopher Wang

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive yet capable Android tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Erb

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_moWX6BE98535FHcurrentClick) { return cv_moWX6BE98535FHcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 5:19 MinsI'ts quite cool that you can get such a capable Android tablet for well under $100. I was not execting much from this Condroid X7 tablet but it has decent performance. If it were not for the poor off-axis viewing of the screen, I'l have given this a 5 star rating.This is a smaller screen with 1024x600 resolution. Color is good but off axis viewing is terrible as you can see in my video.It is a snappy little performer. It's got a dual-core CPU and a quad-core GPU. Google play is installed and that opens up the possibility to download apps to your hearts content. The up to 32GB Micro SD expansion slot expands the memory greatly. You can purchase a 32GB MicroSD card for under $20 these days.Included with this tablet is a cool little 2.4GHz wireless keyboard. It works really well and can be used with other comptuers too. It uses a small USB receiver that plugs into an available USB port and is stored in the battery compartment on the back of the keyboard when not being used. Since this tablet does not have bluetooth, the short USB cable provided allows you to connect the USB receiver into it allowing the tablet to use the wireless keyboard. This does have one bizarre problem though that I noticed... there is a key labeled ".com" which is a shortcut for having to type ".com". However when it is used, it types ".cmo". Believe it or not, it has a hard coded typo in it. How's that for great quality?You also get an AC charger (100-240V, 50/60Hz) so it can be used Internationally, USB to Micro USB cable and a Micro USB to USB extender cable for use with the Keyboard Receiver.This table does not have Bluetooth or GPS and the rear camera is only 2MP while the front camera is only .3MP. Not very good but for the price you probably can't expect much better than that. The built-in speaker is pretty bad sounding but the headphone jack lets you circumvent the poor sound of the speaker by using headphones for audio, when you want better quality (for music or movies, etc)This will run YouTiube videos and Google play opens up the wide world of apps for your downloading pleasure.I can't find much fault with this inexpensive tablet. For the money you get a lot.I was provided a free sample for review.

ProductInfo.Features:
The X7 featuring the newest powerful and robust Dual Core CPU with DDR3 ram, makes everything run faster than ever. Plus, high-performance Quad Core Mali-400 GPU ensures smooth.
Google Android 4.2 (Jelly Bean) OS reveals tons of new adventures to your Dragon Touch tablet. Get access to thousands of useful apps and fun games to download and install on you tablet with Google Play Store pre-installed. Micro SD card slot allows you to add up to 32GB extra space to store songs, videos, photos and other files.
Comparing with A23 X7 model, X7 has higher resolution Multi-Touch HD Screen with 1024x600 which makes ebook, photo, video look great.
Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) keeps you connected on the go. Front-facing camera makes it easy to chat with friends and family, while rear-facing camera allows you to capture the special moments and upload them to facebook and twitter.
Live customer service and tech support from TabletExpress. Robust warranty, on-time customer service/tech support, frequently updated firmware guarantees customer satisfactory. Feel free to contact us whenever a question pops up in your head, we are always here to help.
ProductInfo.Name: Condroid ® 7'' GMS certified by Google Black Dual Core 1.5 GHz Condroid X7 Google Android 4.2 Tablet PC, Dual Camera, HD 800x480, 8GB, Google Play Pre-load, HDMI (Allwinner A23) + Hausbell ® H7 (gift)
